Comments
October 28, 2021
Redrover454
A very solid 40pts. He's no Maggott, but he's solid. He does double-duty as a taxi and a 2nd tier attacker. With Hypersonic, 8 range, 3 bolts, and 11atk and 3dmg, he has options, and you don't have to try that hard to get your 40pts out of him.
July 23, 2020

Welcome back to the meta, Firelord. What a time to be alive.
